lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee (IOC) has rejected clarion calls for Russia to be banned from next month's Rio Olympics over the nation's doping record, offering athletes a lifeline by ruling that decisions on individual competitors will be left to the international sports federations.

headline.print_headline: Russia Escapes IOC Blanket Ban for Rio Olympics
headline.main: Russia Escapes IOC Blanket Ban for Rio Olympics
